name: watch-widget
description: Simple watch widget to run npm run watch from folder context menu
author: Pratik Bali

scripts.clean: if exist out rmdir /S /Q out && mkdir out || echo Cleaned output directory
scripts.clean-vsix: del *.vsix 2>nul || echo No VSIX files to delete
scripts.package: npm run clean-vsix && npm run clean && npm run version:patch && npm run compile && vsce package
scripts.package-only: npm run clean-vsix && npm run clean && npm run compile && vsce package
scripts.install-local: code --install-extension *.vsix --force || echo Extension installed with warnings
scripts.all: npm run package && npm run install-local
